main.java.board

Interface IChessboardDisplay

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChessboardDisplay, CircleBoardDisplay, SquareBoardDisplay

    public interface IChessboardDisplay
    Interface to manage the displaying behaviors of any type of chessboard.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHeight() 
      Point getTopLeftPoint() 
      void resizeChessboard(int newHeight)
      Resize the chessboard to the given height.

    • Method Detail

      • resizeChessboard

        void resizeChessboard(int newHeight)
        Resize the chessboard to the given height. The chessboard keeps the same aspect ratio (width = height)
        Parameters:
        newHeight - the new height to resize the chessboard

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Returns:
        current height of the chessboard

      • getTopLeftPoint

        Point getTopLeftPoint()
        Returns:
        upper point of the chessboard
